TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlObjectReader extends System.Xaml.XamlReader

summary.span: 提供 實作，這個實作會讀取圖形並產生 XAML 節點資料流。

span.span: Provides a implementation that reads object graphs and generates a XAML node stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用在您要處理的物件圖形的情況下，通常是原本從 XAML 來源產生的應用程式的物件圖形。Use the in scenarios where you want to process an object graph, which is typically the object graph of an application that is originally generated from a XAML source. 您可能會使用其中反覆存取由從 XAML 起點到 XAML 結束點。You might use the where a round trip is made from a XAML start point to a XAML end point. 或者您可能會執行透過物件圖形; 處理中繼 XAML 節點資料流，如果需要，在使用 Api和;，然後使用序列化為 XML 的 XAML 節點。Or you might run a over the object graph; process the intermediate XAML node stream, if it is required, by using APIs on and ; and then use to serialize XAML nodes to XML. 更進階的案例可能會提供覆寫和特定 XAML 結構描述內容，使用，然後將傳遞至寫入器覆寫。More advanced scenarios might supply a override and a specific XAML schema context that the uses and then passes to the writer override. 使用的典型案例呼叫成員實作，它們也呼叫， ，和從基底類別。Typical scenarios for using call the members that implements; they also call , , and from the base class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定物件，指定讀取器作業，例如行數字處理、 錯誤處理行為，以及其他規則。The settings object specifies rules for reader operations, such as line number processing, error handling behavior, and so on. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 如果使用這個建構函式，初始化物件都有預設值的初始內容。If initialized with this constructor, the object has the initial context of a default .

span.span: The XAML namespace declaration if the reader is positioned on a ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回非 null 的結果才屬性目前的讀取器位置是。This property returns a non-null result only if the property of the current reader position is . 它不會推斷為基礎的其他節點型別，例如該命名空間中的物件內容的命名空間。It does not infer a namespace that is based on the context of other node types, such as an object in that namespace.

span.span: Gets the type of the current node.
The type of the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用Api，您通常檢查屬性可能的位置往前移讀取器，例如每個作業之後， ，或方法。When using the APIs, you typically check the property after every operation that potentially advances the reader position, such as the , , or methods. 表示您可以從目前讀取器的位置和您在下一個呼叫的方法取得的資訊。 indicates the information that you can obtain from the current reader position and the methods that you call next. 例如，您可能需要存取， ， ，或屬性; 或者您可能會呼叫方法，如果您不想要在目前的節點類型的內容。For example, you might access the , , , or properties; or you might call the method if you are not interested in the contents of the current node type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在您呼叫後方法並取得`true`結果，您通常可以存取的節點屬性。After you call the method and obtain a `true` result, you typically access the node properties. 取決於屬性，您可以存取， ， ，或屬性。Depending on the property, you can access the , , , or properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext SchemaContext { get; }
.property instance class System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext SchemaContext
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SchemaContext As XamlSchemaContext
public: virtual property System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ SchemaContext { System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得物件，這個物件會為資訊集提供結構描述資訊。

span.span: Gets an object that provides schema information for the information set.

value.span: 物件，會為資訊集提供結構描述資訊。

span.span: An object that provides schema information for the information set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構描述內容是傳統的意義而言，結構描述之間的 XAML 結構描述的概念 （剖析、 讀取和寫入作業） 的特定 XAML 處理器所處理的概念媒介。The schema context is a conceptual intermediary between a schema in the conventional sense, and the handling of XAML schema concepts by particular XAML processors (parsing, reading, and writing operations).
